name: Wieder
description:
Wieder, w i e d e r... UND WIEDER!! Finish your tasks as quick as you can! As quick as you can! As quick as you can! Is there an escape? An escape? An escape? Controls:
- Rotate arm left/right - **A/D**
- Move arm - **Mouse**
- Grab/Interact - **Left Mouse Button** Credits:
- Programming, design, and art:
Bradalli
(twitter: @bradalli) - Font: 'Cokiobi' by Nantachi (www.ginanperdana.com) Music:
(taken from Youtube Audio Library) - **Menu Music**
'Analogue Cabin' by Noir Et Blanc Vie  - **Game Music**
'Because For Ever' by pATCHES
